insert into tb_rechargePresents_voucher ( strRechargePresents_voucherId, strVoucherTicketId, dPerTimeRechargeAmount, dMoreRechargeAmount, iTotalNum, iRestNum, strValidateBeginTime, strValidateEndTime, iEnabled, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeRealName, strCreationTime, strLastAccessedTime ) values
( #{entity.strRechargePresents_voucherId}, #{entity.strVoucherTicketId}, #{entity.dPerTimeRechargeAmount}, #{entity.dMoreRechargeAmount}, #{entity.iTotalNum}, #{entity.iRestNum}, #{entity.strValidateBeginTime}, #{entity.strValidateEndTime}, #{entity.iEnabled}, #{entity.strEmployeeId}, #{entity.strEmployeeName}, #{entity.strEmployeeRealName}, #{entity.strCreationTime}, #{entity.strLastAccessedTime} )
